page.shortlink: api client api a5 controlbar class

argument.name: containerId
argument.description: The ID of the element the control bar should be rendered in.

argument.name: settings
argument.description: Settings for the control bar. This will override the initial values of the properties of the A5.ControlBar class.

property.name: theme
property.description: The theme to use on the control bar.

property.name: override
property.description: The overrides to use on the control bar.

property.name: edge
property.description: The "edge" the control bar considers outside. The options are "top" (the default), "bottom", "left" and "right". Lines of the layout are laid out away from this edge. For example in a "top" edge layout, the second line would be below the first. However, on a "bottom" edge layout, the second line would be above the first.

property.name: topClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the control bar layout (main or disclosure) when the edge is "top".

property.name: bottomClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the control bar layout (main or disclosure) when the edge is "bottom".

property.name: leftClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the control bar layout (main or disclosure) when the edge is "left".

property.name: rightClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the control bar layout (main or disclosure) when the edge is "right".

property.name: separator
property.description: Separator settings.

property.name: horizontalClassName
property.description: The class name to apply to a horizontal separator.

property.name: verticalClassName
property.description: The class name to apply to a vertical separator.

property.name: items
property.description: The definition of named items to be used in layouts. Each property in this object will be then name of the item, and must be one of these obejcts: *[link:A5.ControlBar Item HTML Object]*, *[link:A5.ControlBar Item Button Object]*, *[link:A5.ControlBar Item Button Toggle Object]*, *[link:A5.ControlBar Item Button List Object]* or *[link:A5.ControlBar Item Disclosure Button Object]*.

property.name: actions
property.description: The definition of named actions to be used by items, or programmatically via the A5.ControlBar.action method. Each property in this object will be then name of the action, and must be a function. The function will be called with a data argument. The argument is either passed in by the A5.ControlBar.action method, or dynamically created by the item when the user interacts with. See *[link:A5.ControlBar Action Data Object]*.

property.name: layout
property.description: If a string the name of the layout to use. If a function then the function should return the name of the layout to use, and will be called every time the control bar is refreshed.

property.name: layouts
property.description: The definition of named layouts to use in the A5.ControlBar. See *[link:A5.ControlBar Layout Object]*.

property.name: disclosure
property.description: Disclosure settings.

property.name: animation
property.description: Disclosure animation settings.

property.name: duration
property.description: The number of milliseconds a disclosure should take to animate in or out.

property.name: tween
property.description: The CSS "tween" for a disclosure animation. The default is "ease-in-out".

property.name: coverClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that covers the screen while the disclosure is up. This can be used to "grey out" the background.

property.name: cover
property.description: Disclosure settings for when the disclosure is shown as "cover".

property.name: topClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the top edge.

property.name: bottomClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the bottom edge.

property.name: leftClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the left edge.

property.name: rightClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the right edge.

property.name: extend
property.description: Disclosure settings for when the disclosure is shown as "extend".

property.name: topClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the top edge.

property.name: bottomClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the bottom edge.

property.name: leftClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the left edge.

property.name: rightClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the right edge.

property.name: expand
property.description: Disclosure settings for when the disclosure is shown as "expand".

property.name: topClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the top edge.

property.name: bottomClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the bottom edge.

property.name: leftClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the left edge.

property.name: rightClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the element that clips the disclosure when the disclosure is shown from the right edge.

property.name: defaults
property.description: Disclosure default settings.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the disclosure element.

property.name: disclosures
property.description: The definition of named disclosures. See *[link:A5.ControlBar Disclosure Object]*.

property.name: state
property.description: The state information for the control bar.

property.name: layout
property.description: The name of the current layout shown in the control bar.

property.name: disclosure
property.description: State information for the disclosure.

property.name: shown
property.description: Whether or not a disclosure is shown.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the currently shown disclosure. If the disclosure being shown is a layout, the name will be the layout name prefixed with "layout:".

property.name: type
property.description: The show type of the disclosure.

property.name: edge
property.description: The edge the disclosure is shown from. The value will be either "top", "left", "right" or "bottom".

property.name: onBeforePopulate
property.description: Event fired before the control bar is populated. If a value of false is returned by the function the populate will not be done.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The data to populate the control bar with.

property.name: onPopulate
property.description: Event fired when the control bar is populated.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The data the control bar was populated with.

property.name: onBeforeDraw
property.description: Event fired before the a layout in the control bar is drawn.

argument.name: path
argument.description: The part of the control bar the layout is being drawn in. Values can be either "main" or "disclosure".

property.name: onDraw
property.description: Event fired when a layout in the control bar is drawn.

argument.name: path
argument.description: The part of the control bar the layout was drawn in. Values can be either "main" or "disclosure".

argument.name: element
argument.description: The DOM element of the part of the control bar the layout was drawn in.

property.name: onChange
property.description: Event fired when a value in the data is changed, either by user interaction with an item or by the A5.ControlBar.update method.

argument.name: paths
argument.description: An array of all the paths in the data that have been changed.

argument.name: values
argument.description: An array of all the values corresponding to the paths in the data that have been changed.
